extendedInfo.description: Finding the design elements in clothes that best suit your body shape and proportions is essential to building an impactful personal style. With the help of design and body line principles to analyze your body shape, style compass guides you in making the right style choices. Style Compass Lite is a free handy app that helps ladies figure out the right styles suitable to them, based on their body types. It is a personal style guide and is close to having your personal stylist with you all the time!DisclaimerFashion Compass has made the best effort to produce a high quality, informative android app. Fashion Compass makes no representation or warranties of any kind for the completeness or accuracy of the content. Finally, Fashion Compass accepts no liability of any kind for any losses or damages caused or alleged to be caused, directly or indirectly, from using the information contained in this Style Compass app.All rights reserved.No part of this application, in concept or as a artifact, graphical content may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any informational storage or retrieval system without prior written permission from Fashion Compass.End-User License AgreementStyle Compass Lite is a handy app that helps provide possible style suggestions for a particular body type. When the user feeds in details about the type of body he/she has, the application suggests various styles of clothing and fashion.Please read the license agreement at http://fashioncompass.me/sclite/eula.txtPRIVACYPrivacy policy is at: http://fashioncompass.me/privacy.txt

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: It suggests me the best type of dress that suits my body type n I can make the dress of my choice  with any type of color!! So cool~~
reviews.author: A Google User
